about_the_game:
Aquatic Gallery

This Aquatic-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Explore the depths of our wonderful planet with this water-based gallery!

Mystical, wonderful and a little fantastical! Dive into this pack and see what you find!

Contents

The Aquatic Gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Fishing
  • Message in a Bottle
  • Whale
  • Surf
  • Starfish
  • Narwhal
  • Bubbles
  • Frog
  • Jellyfish
  • Swordfish
  • Pufferfish
  • Coral
  • Iceberg
  • Pollution
  • Fish Bowl
  • Diving
  • Submarine
  • Crustaceans
  • Under the Sea
  • Sunken Ship
  • Aquarium

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Aquatic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hungarian
